website_summaries.verdict: A premium curl activator that's made with quality ingredients and has a consistency that's perfect for different types of hair, including thick and dense curls.
pros: Formulated to define and hold curls without making hair feel stiff
Doesn't leave a sticky residue on hair
Not made with harsh ingredients or parabens, and isn't tested on animals
cons: Doesn't always hold up in humid conditions
Tends to make hair look "wet" if you apply too much

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was terrible!! The bottle I received had either been tampered with or was way past its expiration. It has seriously messed with my hair. After just one use, my type 2c/3a hair went nearly straight and felt like a weird straw/plastic hybrid. It has taken 3 washings, 2 deep conditionings, a protein treatment, and over a week for my hair to even begin bouncing back (I'm finally getting some loose waves) from this disaster. I do not recommend purchasing this product at this time. I had to toss the bottle because I was afraid they'd resale it if returned. I wouldn't dare allow this to ruin someone else's curls! Buyer beware!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great conditioner. I've been using the Devacurl One Condition for a couple years now and it's been okay, but this one is much richer and leaves my hair silky and strong. The one problem? It's expensive, and like most conditioners, I have to use much more than a "quarter-sized dollop" to give my hair the moisture it needs. This bottle will last me about 2 weeks... and $40 a month is a lot to spend on conditioner. If you can afford it, though, go for it! It's worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my naturally curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I use this conditioner 3-5 times a week (when I wash my hair). It allows my natural curls to form in a manageable fashion that still looks good and doesn't weight it down. Rich in our exclusive Curl Creating Complex (C3), Recoil separates and holds without stiffness or stickiness, even in high humidity.
